pageTitle: Prime Minister’s itinerary for Monday, March 7, 2022 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

London, United Kingdom

Private meetings

9:50 a.m. The Prime Minister will hold a bilateral meeting with the Prime Minister of the United Kingdom, Boris Johnson.

Northolt Royal Air Force Base
Officers’ Mess

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity at the start of the meeting

10:20 a.m. The Prime Minister will hold a bilateral meeting with the Prime Minister of the Netherlands, Mark Rutte.

Northolt Royal Air Force Base
Officers’ Mess

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity at the start of the meeting

10:50 a.m. The Prime Minister will visit members of the Royal Air Force with the Prime Minister of the United Kingdom, Boris Johnson, and the Prime Minister of the Netherlands, Mark Rutte.

Northolt Royal Air Force Base
Officers’ Mess

Note for media:

  • Pooled coverage

12:15 p.m. The Prime Minister will have an audience with Her Majesty Queen Elizabeth II.

Windsor Castle

Closed to media

2:45 p.m. The Prime Minister will hold a trilateral meeting with the Prime Minister of the United Kingdom, Boris Johnson, and the Prime Minister of the Netherlands, Mark Rutte.

10 Downing Street

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity

3:55 p.m. The Prime Minister will hold a joint press conference with the Prime Minister of the United Kingdom, Boris Johnson, and the Prime Minister of the Netherlands, Mark Rutte.

10 Downing Street

Note for media:

  • Pooled coverage

8:15 p.m. The Prime Minister will depart for Riga, Latvia.

Inflite Jet Centre
London Stansted Airport

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity
